so yeah we had a a small Cloud presence
that was uh helping our Studios but we
made a conscious decision to stop
pushing the boundaries of what we could
really achieve in the cloud we embraced
that to its fullest uh and as such we're
now one of the largest International
visual effects companies to be operating
solely in the cloud we've got Studios
and regions all over the globe working
collaboratively on infrastructure that
was built entirely in AWS the the
support that we've had from AWS along
the way has been phenomenal we've been
fortunate enough to work closely with a
team who share our enthusiasm and are
just as eager as us to show what could
be achieved in the cloud that support
has meant that we've been able to
develop a platform to really help
accelerate the growth uh within Outpost
the the rate at which we're able to
scale our resources
to accommodate our clients requirements
has just been it's tremendous whether
that's the ability to take on more
complex sequences or deliver larger
volumes of work
It ultimately results in the propensity
for us to be able to say yes to our
clients which is great for everyone the
fundamental shift away from an on-prem
environment
and the the speed of which we we did
that was it was always going to be
challenging but our artists and crew
they've been incredibly supportive along
the way
they're open-minded if their willingness
to to change has helped tremendously in
delivering an incredible platform and
that platform now is what's going to
allow us to further push the boundaries
we're now turning to automation to
machine learning AI to see where these
Technologies could take us
